name: Impact Effort Matrix Template & Sticky Notes Component
description:
Introduction:

This is an Impact Effort Matrix Template with a Sticky Notes Component which you can use and customize in any way you want.

 

What will you find in the file:

  • Impact Effort Matrix Template.
  • Sticky Notes Component.

  

Note: each sticky note component has a hidden footer, you can reveal the footer from the layer panel.

 

Creating responsive reusable components is a key for successful and speedy prototypes, especially when there is no direct way to create something, thatâ€™s why I wanted to create this component and share it with you.
